meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Katie Clair Erica Mines Mike Malaier Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6444.

td.p: Katie Clair, an international student coordinator from Broad Brook, Connecticut
Erica Mines, a high school English teacher originally from Washington, D.C.
Mike Malaier, an attorney from Tacoma, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,100)

tr.td: DINING OUT IN NEW YORK
3-LETTER WORDS
APPLE PIE
A VAN DOWN BY THE RIVER
THE CALIFORNIANS
ON SATURDAY NIGHT LIVE
